item.title: Eshell Aliases, Prompt, And Colors
item.description: Do you use #Emacs to run shells or terminal emulators? Well, you should. With vterm you have a fast alternative to the builtin ansi-term. And if you prefer shells, you’ve got EShell and Shell Mode. And don’t forget serial-term for embedded programming. â€” Mickey Petersen (@mickeynp) on Twitter, July 18, 2022.
